content: here s crochet kirby amigurumi in all different forms he can be happy angry and even swallowing with this free kirby crochet pattern you can make the basic kirby base and with just some tweaks to the detail of his face you ll have a whole crew of kirbys sew his arm in different positions to give him some dynamic poses don t forget to also crochet him his warp star 1 approximate size 3 inches tall or 7 cm tall ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ i d love to see how your project turns out tag me with your projects on instagram @ami_amour 2 also you can crochet along with me with the kirby video tutorial 3 on my youtube channel and see the kirby in action ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **level ** easy **need to know ** single_crochet in the round chain slip_stitch how to increase how to decrease assembly of parts 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/star-amigurumi-3 2 https //www instagram com/ami_amour 3 https //www instagram com/ami_amour
